sentences: Co-Chair Chow Kok Kee opened the closing session late Tuesday afternoon.

Observing that the Seminar had produced some very fruitful discussions, he asked experts to present their views on three key issues: technology transfer, adaptation and mitigation. Reflecting on the Seminar, several participants were positive about the open, frank discussions that had taken place.
Luxembourg, on behalf of the EU, identified a 'large consensus' among delegations on the common challenges ahead.
He noted the EUs determination to reinvigorate discussions on the post-2012 period and looked forward to further steps in Montreal at COP-11/MOP-1.
